node.text:
The best vacation is surely a staycation where you are pampered splendid. Guests at The Raviz Kovalam can look forward to airport transfers, welcome drink on arrival, breakfast at The Café, in-room dining options, evening high tea at the living room and complimentary use of the gym and ocean-rimmed infinity pool.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
